example.eg: I hoped by taking the metro I would end up in central Paris.
example.egtrans: 我希望乘地铁就能到达巴黎市中心。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以…结束，以…告终, 死亡

example.eg: If we keep going this way, we'll end up totally lost.
example.egtrans: 如果继续这样走下去，我们最后会完全迷失方向。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 最后变成, 到头来会

example.eg: I would never have gone skydiving if I'd known I was going to end up with a broken leg.
example.egtrans: 要是我知道最后会摔断一条腿，我就不会去跳伞了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 最终落得…下场, 最后居然

example.eg: Julia turned Larry down, so he ended up going to the prom by himself.
example.egtrans: 茱莉亚拒绝了拉里，最后他只能自己一个人去参加了舞会。

example.eg: The story gripped me from the opening line right to the end.
example.egtrans: 这个故事从头到尾一直吸引着我。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 结束，终结, 结尾，结局

example.eg: They live at the end of the street.
example.egtrans: 他们住在那条街的尽头。

example.eg: We're moving at the end of the month.
Is there no end to our problems?
example.egtrans: 我们的问题就没完没了吗？

example.eg: Everyone is striving after some end.
You should place the end of the board against the wall.
example.egtrans: 你应该用板子末端顶住墙。

example.eg: She ended their relationship after just two months.
example.egtrans: 仅仅两个月后，她便结束了他们的关系。

example.eg: The concert ended with a Mozart violin concerto.
example.egtrans: 音乐会在莫扎特的小提琴协奏曲中结束。

example.eg: To what end are we doing all this?
example.egtrans: 我们做这一切目的是什么？

example.eg: By the time the film came to the end credits, most of the audience was crying.
example.egtrans: 电影放映到片尾字幕时，绝大多数观众都在流泪。

example.eg: He met an untimely end.
It was the marketing end of the enterprise that caused the failure.
example.egtrans: 这次失败是公司营销部造成的。

example.eg: It's the end of the world as we know it.

dsense.name: the end
dsense.guideword: slang, dated (the best) (俚语，旧时用语)

example.eg: I love John Coltrane. He's the end!
Please put your cigar ends in the ashtray.
He was the best offensive end in the team's history.
example.egtrans: 他是该队有史以来最好的进攻端锋。

dsense.name: The End
dsense.guideword: written (book, film: indicating the finish) (电视等)

example.eg: "The End" appeared on the screen in giant letters.
example.egtrans: “剧终”两个大字出现在屏幕上。

example.eg: "Honestly, Tabitha, you're the end!" said her mother in an exasperated voice.
Where will it all end?
example.egtrans: 这件事最终结果会是什么？

example.eg: We were trying to get to Brighton, but we ended up in Hastings.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 结果却是, 最终却是, 以…告终

example.eg: The rain ended our plans to play tennis.
If only God would end the person who did this!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 杀死, 了结, 消灭

dsense.name: end up on the scrap heap

trans_examp.trans_cn: 被废弃, 被作为废物抛弃

dsense.name: end up on the scrap heap of history

example.eg: His well-intentioned efforts have ended up on the scrap heap of history.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 被扫进历史的垃圾堆, 被历史遗忘

dsense.name: keep your end up, hold your end up

trans_examp.trans_cn: 负起你那份责任, 做好你分内的事
